issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Execution context should allow in-memory data sources to be registered
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4603](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4603). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently it is only possible to run SQL queries against CSV files. I would like to be able to run SQL queries against data that is already loaded into memory in a single RecordBatch or an iterator over RecordBatch.

There are two reasons I want this feature:
1. Ability to call DataFusion via IPC or JNI from Java to run queries
1. Ability to create benchmarks for the query engine that do not involve disk I/O
